text: Anita Baker (born January 26, 1958, in Toledo, Ohio, and raised in Detroit, Michigan) is a singer and recording artist. She has had multiple studio records with hit songs. She was born near Toledo, Ohio. She was raised around Detroit. She received several Grammy Awards due to her numerous recordings, mostly during the 1980s, in which decade she was extremely popular. ==References== Category:American R&B; singers Category:American soul musicians Category:American jazz singers Category:Musicians from Toledo, Ohio Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Singers from Detroit Category:Singers from Ohio Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American soul singers
title: Anita Baker
